section.title: www.lanana.org
section.para: To get more information about the naming of devices and their major and minor number, visit lananalanana.org (Linux Assigned Names And Numbers Authority) at http://www.lanana.org. There is a list of all devices at http://www.lanana.org/docs/device-list/devices.txt .

section.title: Documentation/devices.txt
section.para: For a complete list of block and character devices, take a look at the devices.txt file in the Documentation directory in the kernel source.
